biotools.summary: General software framework for modeling and simulation of stochastic reaction-diffusion processes on arbitrary meshes. URDME emphasizes modularity in order to be useful both as a simulation tool and as a framework for development of stochastic simulation algorithms.

bioschemas.name: URDME
bioschemas.summary: General software framework for modeling and simulation of stochastic reaction-diffusion processes on arbitrary meshes. URDME emphasizes modularity in order to be useful both as a simulation tool and as a framework for development of stochastic simulation algorithms.
